content.text: Gilles Bonugli Kali, a genesis EOS community member and artist known as GBK, has dedicated more than 20 years to capturing the diverse beauty of Earth and its people. A self-taught artist from the South of France,  GBK enjoys the challenge of learning different artistic disciplines from videography to graphic design. This enthusiastic approach to life has always flowed from the idiom that “Diversity Makes Sense”.  In fact, all life in the universe flows from diversity through plants, trees, minerals, musical styles and human ethnicities of all kinds. GBK’s artistic portfolio represents this commitment to diversity and is recently fueled by his digital nomadic lifestyle that allows him to travel the world with Yoshi, his soulmate.
